terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks
Class BasicBlocks

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks.BasicBlocks
public class BasicBlocks
extends java.lang.Object

These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "basic" control.

Because these building blocks are rather specific in purpose they are included here as utilities instead of as general purpose building block classes in the framework core.

Nested Class Summary
static class BasicBlocks.Colorer
          Example building block that connects the input events to a TestThing target such that the target changes color as the input modifier state changes.
static class BasicBlocks.Rotator
          Example building block that connects its input events to a TransformGroup target such that the target rotates as input position changes.
static class BasicBlocks.Translator
          Example building block that connects its input events to a TransformGroup target such that the target translates as input position changes.

buildView

public static final javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup buildView(AppView view,
                                                             javax.vecmath.Vector3d pos,
                                                             javax.vecmath.Vector3d rot)
Attaches the view to a TransformGroup, positions and rotates it, and adds a headlight.

Parameters:
view - View to be attached.
pos - Position of view.
rot - Euler rotation of view.
Returns:
TransformGroup with view attached.

buildTarget

public static final javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup[] buildTarget(javax.media.j3d.Node target)
Creates a chain of transforms used for manipulating a target object. Typically the first transform is for translation and the second one if for some interactive operation (translation, rotation, scale, etc.).

Parameters:
target - Target object.
Returns:
Transform chain with the target attached. The head transform is [0], which is initialized with . The tail transform is [1], which contains the target.

buildTarget

public static final javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup[] buildTarget(javax.media.j3d.Node target,
                                                                 javax.vecmath.Vector3d pos)
Creates a chain of transforms used for manipulating a target object. Typically the first transform is for translation and the second one if for some interactive operation (translation, rotation, scale, etc.).

Parameters:
target - Target object.
pos - Initial position of the first transform.
Returns:
Transform chain with the target attached. The head transform is [0], which is initialized with . The tail transform is [1], which contains the target.
